parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X-coordinate for placement of the bend table

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y-coordinate for placement of the bend table

parameters.name: StartValue
parameters.description: Starting datum tag; a value from A to Z for letter tags; a positive integer for number tags

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Full pathname of the template (e.g., install_dir \ lang\ language \ bendtable-standard.sldbndtbt )

title: IPartDoc.InsertBendTable
description: Creates a bend table annotation for the flat pattern of this sheet metal part.
signature:
System.Object InsertBendTable( 
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.String
StartValue
,
   System.String
TableTemplate
)
